Another option could be "Law Abiding Citizen" (2009), a thrilling drama starring Gerard Butler, about a man seeking justice when a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. Both films are highly engaging and offer a unique blend of comedy and drama elements. Enjoy your movie time!
